name: DRIP
label: DRIP
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve a dividend payment whereby holders can keep cash or have the cash reinvested into additional shares in the issuing company

name: MRGR
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve the exchange of outstanding securities, initiated by the issuer which may include options, as the result of two or more companies combining assets, that is, an external, third party company
label: MRGR

name: CONV
label: CONV
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve conversion of securities (generally convertible bonds or preferred shares) into another form of securities (usually common shares) at a pre-stated price/ratio

name: DVOP
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve distribution of a dividend to shareholders with a choice of benefit to receive
label: DVOP

name: CONS
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve procedures aiming to obtain consent of holder to a proposal by the issuer or a third party without convening a meeting
label: CONS

name: MCAL
label: MCAL
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities prior to maturity

name: DVCA
label: DVCA
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that distribute cash to shareholders in proportion to their equity holding

name: WRTH
label: WRTH
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve booking out of valueless securities

name: BIDS
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions in which an offer is made to existing shareholders by the issuing company to repurchase equity or other securities convertible into equity
label: BIDS

name: REDM
label: REDM
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve redemption of an entire issue outstanding of securities at final maturity

name: SOFF
label: SOFF
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve the distribution of subsidiary stock to the shareholders of the parent company without a surrender of shares

name: ISO15022CorporateActionClassificationScheme
definition: scheme for classifying corporate actions according to ISO 15022 Securities - Scheme for Messages (Data Field Dictionary)
label: ISO 15022 corporate action classification scheme

name: BPUT
label: BPUT
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve early redemption of a security at the election of the holder subject to the terms and condition of the issue with no reduction in nominal value

name: REDO
label: REDO
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions by which the unit (currency and/or nominal) of a security is restated

name: SHPR
label: SHPR
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that pay shareholders an amount in cash issued from the shares premium reserve

name: EXTM
label: EXTM
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve prolonging the maturity date of a bond

name: CAPD
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that pay shareholders an amount in cash issued from the issuer's capital account
label: CAPD

name: PARI
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that occur when securities with different characteristics become identical in all respects
label: PARI

name: DSCL
label: DSCL
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve a requirement for holders or beneficial owners to disclose their name, location and holdings of any issue to the issuer

name: DECR
label: DECR
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that reduce the face value of a share or the value of fund assets

name: BONU
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions in which security holders are awarded additional assets free of payment from the issuer in proportion to their holding
label: BONU

name: EXOF
label: EXOF
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that reflect an exchange of holdings for other securities and/or cash

name: SPLR
label: SPLR
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve a decrease in a company's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split

name: DVSE
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve distribution of a dividend to shareholders in the form of equities of the issuing corporation
label: DVSE

name: PRIO
label: PRIO
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve a public offer where priority is given to existing shareholders

name: LIQU
label: LIQU
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions consisting of distribution of cash, assets, or both

name: EXRI
label: EXRI
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve a call or exercise on nil paid securities or intermediate securities resulting from an intermediate securities distribution (RHDI)

name: PRED
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve redemption of securities in part before their scheduled final maturity date with no reduction in nominal value
label: PRED

name: CAPG
label: CAPG
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that distribute profits resulting from the sale of company assets to shareholders

name: INTR
label: INTR
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve distribution of a regular interest payment to holders of an interest-bearing asset

name: INFO
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions involving information provided by the issuer having no accounting/financial impact on the holder
label: INFO

name: CLSA
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions involving a situation where interested parties seek restitution for financial loss
label: CLSA

name: PCAL
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve redemption of securities in part before their scheduled final maturity date with reduction of the nominal value of the securities
label: PCAL

name: CHAN
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that disseminate information regarding a change further described in the corporate action details
label: CHAN

name: EXWA
label: EXWA
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that offer holders the option to buy (call warrant) or to sell (put warrant) a specific amount of stock, cash, or commodity, at a predetermined price, during a predetermined period of time

name: DTCH
label: DTCH
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions involving parties wishing to acquire a security

name: TEND
label: TEND
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions involving information provided by the issuer having no accounting/financial impact on the holder

name: SPLF
label: SPLF
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that involve an increase in a corporation's number of outstanding equities without any change in the shareholder's equity or the aggregate market value at the time of the split

name: DFLT
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions that indicate a failure by the issuer to perform obligations defined as default events under the bond agreement and that have not been remedied
label: DFLT

name: RHDI
label: RHDI
definition: ISO 15022 classifier for corporate actions involving the distribution of intermediate securities or privilege that gives the holder the right to take part in a future event
